title: U.S. Set Up For Scorched Earth Get Ready Or Get Out | Agenda 21
text:
(Before It's News)
I have often said I won’t warn folks about what is in the future of the U. S. No real thanks or gratitude for it. But I feel as if I am to do it. Lets take a look at what is going on. The moron in the WH is taking orders well. I mean he’s made a fortune being a doormat for almost 8 years. Anyway the chemtrails are also an incendiary device thats why when the Russians light um, the trees, up they burn like a two year old christman tree. Lets revisit the ammo. Who are the hollow points for. I will tell you, go into the bathroom look in the mirror and you will see who they are for. Why do we have U N forces in the US Russian forces in the US Chinese forces in Mexico? So they can use the billion or so hollow points that just happen to fit UN guns. The US troops won’t shoot Americans but since we are already hated around the world the rest will have no problem. FEMA camps? Are they schools. When your kids don’t come home from school you will be able to find them at the local FEMA camp then they got you. The FEMA manual says parents will be seperated from the children. Why? The U S is in grave danger and now we have a Russian sub off the west coast with 120 ballistic missles. We know that o is a muslim communist did he make a deal? is that part of the NWO. Stick around you will find out soon enough. Why has Niburu vanished from the news? You
think it disapeared and you shouldn’t worry about it. A fine idea for an intelligent american. You have a planet 6.66 times the size of earth. Someone gave me the #’s yesterday and you wonder why the call the telescope Lucifer. You can’t make this stuff up. So it swings by drops 700 lb iron boulders smouldering in some type of cyanide gas goes away and does the same thing 150 days later as it goes back from where it came. OH yeah it’s companion planets the ones that cause earthquakes, volcanos and a pole shift. Get that Brazil is going to be the new N POLE. How many people watched the psyop on the L Shaped craft on it’s way to get us. This gov’t psyop is the worst I have ever seen. Be afraid of the aliensn but don’t by any means think about Niburu and it’s partner planets or how the economy is failing. And for those that have money in the Bank. Send it to me now let me use it because it doesn’t belong to you anyway plus it’s going to be stolen because a law was passed making your deposit the property of the Bank. TAKE YOUR MONEY OUT OF THE BANK.
I am not sure about nukes in the gulf to get at the worlds 2nd largest oil reserve. The scary part is the U S has been written off as a junk yard. So they will frak till the tap water becomes flame thrower. They will burn the forests so you have no place to hide. Caves are being bricked up by the core of engineers. False flags are on the rise. Boy does TPTB want your guns. The pathetic performance of Mr Teleprompter was on what used to be news before they knew the shooters name. Did he really get 6 figurers for his performance. The whole thing is a riot dead people and nobody can keep a straight face. Thats the kind of financial winfall I need.
Everything the Gov’t is throwing out right now is a distraction from the real. So this is what you have to look forward to. Jeeez I forgot the EMP and solar flares which will render anything electric worthless. Don’t worry it’s just little things like your car, electric, pumping gas. See now the diesel may not be effected but without a payment system the food in the stores, oh what do you mean no food. Well we coud not pay for our last order cause we ain’t got no electric so they won’t sens us any more. If you don’t beleive me check out BP Earthwatch when the largest solar flare he had ever seen left the sun. No worries it went another way. Luck cause if it came our way you wouldn’t be reading this. I’m sorry but people are facing death from multiple directions and you have one person story this proves the bible is real and another says the boogie man is on its way from space. Let me be clear. If you don’t find suitable protection from whats on the road you have about a 10% chance of living past March. Lets tell you what this know nothing is doing.
left the country before martial law
located a town with a cave
bought food and water
will wrap all documents that can track me in foil. They WILL try and chip everyone ( unless citizens revolt )
bought a tyvek bunny suit to protect me from the radiation ash falling from the sky. If it gets on your skin get it off and wash QUICK or the big C will become part of your every day chat.
I may have to buy a horse, and for the wise guys keep it in the cave, as my car will melt. So will yours if you don’t believe me I refer you Janet Napolitanos parting statements.
THE GOVERNMENT WANTS US DEAD. EVRY CONGRESSMAN AND SENATOR IS BLACKMAILED & BRIBED
One more thing don’t ask me where I get the information. Do your own research. It’s all public record. I
I will part with the Chinese gold scam. In 1934 China was scared they would be invaded by Japan so 3 battleships of gold SOMETHING CRAZY LIKE A BILLION TONS, IT’S IN THE STORY, were sent to THE FEDERAL RESERVE BANK LMAO. THEY WERE TO RETURN IT IN 60 YEARS. THE 60 YEARS WAS UP ON, YOU READY 9/12/2001. OPPS SO BESIDE THE CHINESE GOLD THE 300 BILLION DOLLARS WORTH OF GOLD IN THE VAULT IN THE BASEMENT OF THE WORLD TRADE CENTER PUFF GONE. FUNNY THING 2 C 130′S WERE FLOWN TO PARAGUAY A FEW DAYS LATER. NOW WHO BOUGHT 90 ACRES IN PATAGUAY OH YEAH THE PRESIDENT AT THE TIMES FATHER. WHEN EVERY DIME IS SUCKED OUT OF THE US IS WHEN YOU WILL GET THE NWO UNLESS THEY ARE ALL PUT BEHIND BARS.
